contentrichtext.text: {{coord|23|07|S|14|32|E|display=title}} {{Infobox river | name = Kuiseb River | image_name = Kuiseb Namibia anagoria.JPG | caption = The Kuiseb River during rain season | image_map = NEO kuiseb.jpeg | map_caption = Satellite image of the Kuiseb River | origin = [[Windhoek]] | mouth = [[Walvis Bay]] | location = [[Namibia]] | length = | length_km = | length_mi = 300 | elevation = | elevation_m = | elevation_ft = | mouth_elevation = | mouth_elevation_m = | mouth_elevation_ft = | discharge = | discharge_m3/s = | discharge_cuft/s = | watershed = | watershed_km2 = | watershed_sqmi = }} The '''Kuiseb River''' in [[Namibia]] flows from the [[Khomas Region|Khomas]] highlands west of [[Windhoek]] to [[Walvis Bay]]. The Kuiseb is an [[ephemeral]] river with a mean run-off of roughly 20 million cubic metres per annum.<ref name=el2010>{{cite news |title=ELECTIONS 2010: Erongo regional profile |publisher=[[New Era (Namibia)|New Era]] |url=http://www.newera.com.na/article.php?articleid=14109 |date=16 November 2010}}</ref> It is bordered on one side by some of the tallest [[sand dune]]s in the world, and on the other by barren rock. The red sand dunes south of the river reach heights over 150 meters. The prevailing winds blow the dunes northward, but their movement is blocked by the river. In the process, so much sand and silt is deposited in the Kuiseb that it only reaches the sea while it is in flood. [[Friedenau Dam]], built in 1972, is located on the river.<ref>[http://www.namwater.com.na/data/dams/friedenau.html Friedenau] at NamWater</ref> <gallery> File:Kuiseb River Nears the Ocean.jpg|Natural-colour satellite image of the Kuiseb River. </gallery> ==See also== * [[List of rivers of Namibia]] ==References== {{reflist}} *''The original entry was from the [[NASA Earth Observatory]] [http://earthobservatory.nasa.gov/Newsroom/NewImages/images.php3?img_id=4087]'' ==External links== {{commons category|Kuiseb River}} *{{Britannica|324499}} *[http://earthobservatory.nasa.gov/Newsroom/NewImages/images.php3?img_id=4087 NASA Earth Explorer page] *[http://www.ufz.de/data/ufzdiss5_2010_12645.pdf PhD Dissertation at the Helmholtz Centre for Environmental Research - UFZ] [[Category:Rivers of Namibia]] [[Category:Geography of Erongo Region]] {{Namibia-geo-stub}}
